turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Julian , could you get me a coffee please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes boss , where do you want it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks will be perfect!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay , What coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an Iced Caffe Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want cream and sugar with it ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes regular cream and sugar please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure , and would you like it skinny or regular?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you regular is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what size would you like your coffee to be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what milk do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Mmm I want Almond Milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course! And would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay got it!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually! I do want whipped cream!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much would that be?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No more than 5$.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay I will pay you back when you get here!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure no problem! Coffee is ordered!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, See you soon!
